#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,l;
	bool state;
	string s;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		state=true;
		cin>>s;
		l=s.length();
		for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
		{
			if(!(s.at(i)=='0' || s.at(i)=='6' || s.at(i)=='8' || s.at(i)=='9' || s.at(i)=='1'))
			{
				state=false;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(!state)
			cout<<"NO";
		else
		{
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
			for(int i=l-1;i>=0;i--)
			{
				if(s.at(i)=='0' || s.at(i)=='8' || s.at(i)=='1')
					cout<<s.at(i);
				else if(s.at(i)=='9')
					cout<<'6';
				else
					cout<<'9';
			}
		}
		cout<<endl;
			
	}
	return 0;
}
